Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: PRO Z790-P WIFI DDR4


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Supports 13th / 12th Gen Intel Core Processors, Intel Pentium Gold, Celeron Processors


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel Z790


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR4)
Memory Standard: Supports 2133/ 2666/ 3200 MHz (by JEDEC & POR)

Maxoverclocking frequency:
- 1DPC 1R Max speed up to 5333+ MHz
- 1DPC 2R Max speed up to 4800+ MHz
- 2DPC 1R Max speed up to 4400+ MHz
- 2DPC 2R Max speed up to 4000+ MHz

Supports Dual-Channel mode
Supports non-ECC, un-buffered memory
Supports Intel Extreme Memory Profile (XMP)
Maximum Memory Supported: 128GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: PCI_E1 slot (From CPU)
- Supports up to PCIe 5.0 x16
PCI Express 4.0 x16: PCI_E3 slot (From Z790 chipset)
- supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4
PCI Express 3.0 x16: PCI_E4 slot (From Z790 chipset)
- supports up to PCIe 3.0 x1
PCI Express x1: 1x PCIe x1 slot (From Z790 chipset)
- PCI_E2 supports up to PCIe 3.0 x1


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 6x SATA 6Gb/s ports (From Z790 chipset)
M.2: 1 x Key M (CPU PCIe) + 1 x Key M (PCH PCIe) + 2 x Key M (PCIe/SATA) + 1 x Key E (WiFi/BT)

4x M.2 slots (Key M)
M2_1 slot (From CPU)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4
- Supports 2242/ 2260/ 2280/ 22110 storage devices
M2_2 slot (From Z790 chipset)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4
- Supports 2242/ 2260/ 2280 storage devices
M2_3 slot (From Z790 chipset)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4
- Supports SATA 6Gb/s
- Supports 2242/ 2260/ 2280 storage devices
M2_4 slot (From Z790 chipset)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4
- Supports SATA 6Gb/s
- Supports 2242/ 2260/ 2280 storage devices
SATA RAID: Supports RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5 and RAID 10 for SATA storage devices
Supports RAID 0, RAID 1 , RAID 5 and RAID 10 for M.2 NVMe storage devices


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek ALC897
Audio Channels: 7.1 Channels


Onboard LAN
LAN Chipset: 1x Intel 2.5Gbps LAN controller
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps
Wireless LAN: Intel Wi-Fi 6E
- The Wireless module is pre-installed in the M.2 (Key-E) slot
- Supports MU-MIMO TX/RX, 2.4GHz/ 5GHz/ 6GHz* (160MHz)up to 2.4Gbps
- Supports 802.11 a/ b/ g/ n/ ac/ ax

* Wi-Fi 6E 6GHz may depend on every countryâ€™s regulations and will be ready in Windows 10 build 21H1 and Windows 11.
Bluetooth: Supports Bluetooth 5.2*, FIPS, FISMA
* Bluetooth 5.2 will be ready in Windows 10 build 21H1 and Windows 11.


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1x Flash BIOS button
1x PS/2 port
4x USB 2.0 Type-A ports (From Z790 chipset)
1x DisplayPort
1x HDMI port
1x LAN (RJ45) jack
2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps Type-A ports (From Z790 chipset)
1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 10Gbps Type-A port (From Z790 chipset)
1x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 20Gbps Type-C port (From Z790 chipset)
2x Wi-Fi Antenna connectors
6x Audio jacks


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 10Gbps Type-C port (From Z790 chipset)
2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps connector (From Z790 chipset)
- Supports additional 4 USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps ports
2x USB 2.0 Type-A connectors (From Hub-GL850G)
- Supports additional 4 USB 2.0 ports
Other Connectors: Fan Connectors
1x 4-pin CPU fan connector
1x 4-pin water-pump fan connector
6x 4-pin system fan connectors

System Connectors
1x Front panel audio connector
2x System panel connectors
1x Chassis Intrusion connector
1x TPM module connector
1x Tuning controller connector
1x TBT connector (Supports RTD3)

Jumpers
1x Clear CMOS jumper

LED Features
4x EZ Debug LED
1x 4-pin RGB LED connector
2x 3-pin ARGB Gen2 LED connectors


Software Feature
Windows 11: Supported


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
LED Lighting: RGB
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1x 24-pin ATX main power connector
2x 8-pin ATX 12V power connectors
